about_the_game:
Demiurgos is a competitive strategy god game where you embody one of twelve powerful Deities, each vying for supremacy. Convert mortals into devoted followers, wield miraculous powers, and shape the world in your image. Outmaneuver rival gods by spreading your influence and diminishing their devotion.

Choose your path: Will you rule as a benevolent deity of light and order or unleash chaos and darkness upon the world? With the freedom to be good or evil, orderly or chaotic, the fate of humanity—and your divine legacy—is in your hands.

Shape the hearts. Shape the world. Assert your divine will.
detailed_description:
Demiurgos is a competitive strategy god game where you embody one of twelve powerful Deities, each vying for supremacy. Convert mortals into devoted followers, wield miraculous powers, and shape the world in your image. Outmaneuver rival gods by spreading your influence and diminishing their devotion.

Choose your path: Will you rule as a benevolent deity of light and order or unleash chaos and darkness upon the world? With the freedom to be good or evil, orderly or chaotic, the fate of humanity—and your divine legacy—is in your hands.

Shape the hearts. Shape the world. Assert your divine will.

name: Demiurgos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1650 (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 390X (8GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Demiurgos is a competitive strategy god game where you wield divine powers to convert followers, outmaneuver rival deities, and reshape the world. Choose Good or Evil, Chaos or Order, and forge your path to dominance. Inspire devotion or instill fear—the choice is yours.
